name: df-kgen
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ckgen, cmpt(s0, ctop, crab(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), wi(wcel(co(cv(s0), crest, cv(s2)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s1), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), crest, cv(s2))))))))
comment: Define the "compact generator", the functor from topological spaces to compactly generated spaces. Also known as the k-ification operation. A set is k-open, i.e. ` x e. ( kGen `` j ) ` , iff the preimage of ` x ` is open in all compact Hausdorff spaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)
